text.section:
This section does not apply if:
an act is agreed to by a forfeiting authority or is ordered by the court; or
an owner posts a bond under § 12-208 of this subtitle.

Subject to subsection (a) of this section, until the court enters judgment in favor of the owner, an owner may not attempt:
to convey or encumber an interest in seized real property; or
to remove a building or fixture on seized real property.
